# Terms and Conditions

## Welcome to SUNBRIX Constructions

These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of SUNBRIX Constructions' services and website.

### 1. Service Agreement
By engaging our construction services, you accept these terms and conditions in full. If you disagree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.

### 2. Construction Services
- All construction work will be performed according to agreed specifications
- Project timelines are estimates and may vary due to weather, material availability, or unforeseen circumstances
- Payment schedules will be as per the signed contract

### 3. Liability
SUNBRIX Constructions maintains appropriate insurance coverage for all projects. Our liability is limited to the terms specified in individual project contracts.

### 4. Changes to Terms
We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Updated terms will be posted on our website.

Contact us at sunbrix.co@gmail.com for any questions regarding these terms.
privacy_policy:
# Privacy Policy

## Information We Collect

SUNBRIX Constructions is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

### Personal Information
- Name and contact details when you inquire about our services
- Project requirements and preferences
- Communication history for project management

### How We Use Your Information
- To provide construction services and project updates
- To communicate about your project progress
- To improve our services and customer experience

### Information Protection
- We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data
- Your information is never sold or shared with third parties without consent
- Project details remain confidential throughout and after completion

### Your Rights
- Request access to your personal information
- Request correction of any inaccurate information
- Request deletion of your information (subject to legal requirements)

### Contact
For privacy concerns or to exercise your rights, contact us at sunbrix.co@gmail.com.

This policy was last updated: 11/16/2025
